title: Miranda and the Magician
description: There is a magician at the caravan. No one is quite sure where he came from or who he is but the owner seems to know him. His magic is real and somehow it's changing everyone. Miranda used to not care about anyone but now she finds herself at the center of a devoted group of friends and when danger strikes the caravan and threatens everything she loves, she finds that the magician is not the only one with special skills.
author: H.N. Hunt
